thread.title: Priyanka Chopra’s ‘Exotic’ look from ‘Quantico’ raises temperature
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra’s ‘Exotic’ look from ‘Quantico’ raises temperature

author: Deccan
title: Priyanka Chopra’s ‘Exotic’ look from ‘Quantico’ raises temperature
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 07, 2015, 18.42 pm Mumbai: Bollywood’s multi talented star Priyanka Chopra is having the time of her life. Ever since her Hollywood show ‘Quantico’ found its way to everyone’s television sets, the actress has been receiving a lot of applause for her performance in the show.
Now after seeing Priyanka enacting a bold sex in the car scene in ‘Quantico’, we’ll get to see the actress in a very ‘Exotic’ avatar. Yes, we’ll get to see the sizzling beauty flaunting her perfectly sculptured body in a navy blue swimsuit in the next episode of ‘Quantico’. But you can skip the waiting right now as we bring you the fresh pictures of Priyanka's sizzling new look!
In these pictures, Priyanka surely is raising temperature with her desirable perfect body. ‘Quantico’s next week’s episode will have Priyanka’s character Alex Parrish participating in swimming competition.
This isn’t the first time that we are seeing Priyanka in a swimsuit. If you remember well, the diva has flaunted her perfect curves in a swimsuit in films like ‘Dostana’, ‘Don’ and even in her song ‘Exotic’s music video.
Priyanka is seen as FBI trainee Alex Parrish, suspected of committing a terrorist attack, in the thriller drama. The actress, who plays the lead in the action series, is officially the first Indian star to bag a leading role in a television show abroad.
